text: She prayed to Sister Juana, in season, and very contrite, she fasted, and always praying, with unparalleled devotion. "See", said the abbotess, very much a-see how Sister Juana lives, follow her beautiful conduct. And the nuns said under the mantle to this woman, We will live like her, when we do so again. FIN
title: Sor Juana
author: Jean de La Fontaine
